entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 08:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 22.5 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
